Agent.Script:
#!/bin/bash ############ {0} ############ MESSAGE=$(echo -e "$MESSAGE") case "$IMPORTANCE" in 'normal' ) PRIORITY="-1" ;; 'warning' ) PRIORITY="0" ;; 'alert' ) PRIORITY="1" ;; esac
curl -k -s \ -F "token=$APP_TOKEN" \ -F "user=$USER_KEY" \ -F "message=$MESSAGE" \ -F "timestamp=$TIMESTAMP" \ -F "priority=$PRIORITY" \ -F "html=1" \ https://api.pushover.net/1/messages.json 2>&1
